languages.text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the flagship. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
This overload expends 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s shields.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Создает перегрузку на пустотных {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитах{/g} противника, перераспределяя их самой слабой стороной к флагману. Если у противника есть голополе, число его зарядов сокращается. Пульсация может негативно влиять и на другие технологии ксеносов.
Перегрузка расходует 25% заряда щитов {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g}.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Overloads the shields to disrupt the enemy's defences. If the enemy has shields, they are moved to the opposite side from where the attack hits. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges.
This overload expends 25% of the Flagship's shields.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1-3 rounds at random.</indent>

Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the flagship. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
This overload expends 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s shields.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

This overload expends 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s shields.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them with their weakest side towards the flagship. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact xenos technology.
This overload expends 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s shields.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them with their weakest side towards the flagship. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact xenos technology.
This overload expends 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s shields.

Создает перегрузку на пустотных {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитах{/g} противника, перераспределяя их самой слабой стороной к флагману. Если у противника есть голополе, число его зарядов сокращается. Пульсация может негативно влиять и на другие технологии ксеносов.
Перегрузка расходует 25% заряда щитов {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g}.

languages.original_text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them with their weakest side towards the flagship. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
This overload expends 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s shields.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.text:
Überlädt die {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g} des Gegners und verteilt sie um, wobei die schwächste Seite auf das Flaggschiff gerichtet ist. Hat der Feind einen Holoschild, verliert dieser mehrere Ladungen. Der Impuls kann auch andere Xenos-Technologie negativ beeinflussen.
Diese Überladung verbraucht 25 % der Schilde des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g}.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(1 bis 3)</u> Runden (zufällig).</indent>
languages.original_text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the flagship. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
This overload expends 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s shields.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Überlädt die {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g} des Gegners und verteilt sie um, wobei die schwächste Seite auf das Flaggschiff gerichtet ist. Hat der Feind einen Holoschild, verliert dieser mehrere Ladungen. Der Impuls kann auch andere Xenos-Technologie negativ beeinflussen.
Diese Überladung verbraucht 25 % der Schilde des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g}.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(1 bis 3)</u> Runden (zufällig).</indent>

Überlastet die {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g}, um die Verteidigung des Feindes zu stören. Wenn der Feind Schilde hat, werden diese auf die gegenüberliegende Seite des Treffers verschoben. Wenn der Feind über ein Holofeld verfügt, verliert es mehrere seiner Ladungen. Der Impuls kann auch Xenos-Technologie beeinträchtigen.
Diese Überladung verbraucht 25 % der Schilde des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g}.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: Zufällige Rundenanzahl <u>(von 1 bis 3)</u>.</indent>

languages.text:
Surcharge les {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} de l'ennemi pour affaiblir au maximum ceux qui font face au vaisseau amiral. Si l'ennemi dispose d'un holo-champ, il perd plusieurs de ses charges. L'impulsion peut également compromettre le fonctionnement d'autres technologies xénos.
Cette surcharge consomme 25 % des boucliers du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}.
<indent=5%>Temps de recharge : <u>de 1 à 3</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>
languages.original_text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the flagship. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
This overload expends 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s shields.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Surcharge les {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} de l'ennemi pour affaiblir au maximum ceux qui font face au vaisseau amiral. Si l'ennemi dispose d'un holo-champ, il perd plusieurs de ses charges. L'impulsion peut également compromettre le fonctionnement d'autres technologies xénos.
Cette surcharge consomme 25 % des boucliers du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}.
<indent=5%>Temps de recharge : <u>de 1 à 3</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>

Surcharge les {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} pour perturber les défenses de l'ennemi. Si l'ennemi dispose de boucliers, ils sont déplacés du côté opposé à celui où l'attaque touche la cible. Si l'ennemi dispose d'un holo-champ, il perd plusieurs de ses charges. L’impulsion peut également impacter négativement les autres technologies xénos.
Cette surcharge consomme 25 % des boucliers du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}.
<indent=5%>Délai de récupération : <u>(de 1 à 3)</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>

Surcharge les {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} de l'ennemi pour affaiblir au maximum ceux qui font face au vaisseau amiral. Si l'ennemi dispose d'un holo-champ, il perd plusieurs de ses charges. L'impulsion peut également compromettre le fonctionnement de la technologie xénos.
Cette surcharge consomme 25 % des boucliers du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}.
<indent=5%>Délai de récupération : <u>de 1 à 3</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>

languages.text:
令敌舰{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}超载，同时令敌舰护盾最脆弱的一侧转向旗舰。如果敌舰拥有全息投影，则会损失几层投影层数。此外，脉冲还会对其他异形技术造物产生负面影响。
护盾过载会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}25%的护盾。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the flagship. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
This overload expends 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s shields.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
令敌舰{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}超载，同时令敌舰护盾最脆弱的一侧转向旗舰。如果敌舰拥有全息投影，则会损失几层投影层数。此外，脉冲还会对其他异形技术造物产生负面影响。
护盾过载会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}25%的护盾。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>

令敌舰{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}超载，扰乱其防御系统。如果敌舰受到护盾保护，则护盾会被移动至攻击命中方向的相反面。如果敌舰拥有全息投影，则会损失几层投影层数。此外，脉冲还会对异形技术造物产生负面影响。
超载会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}25%的护盾。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>

languages.text:
Sobrecarga los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} del enemigo, redistribuyéndolos y dejando el lado más débil orientado hacia la nave insignia. Si el enemigo tiene un campo holográfico, pierde varias cargas. El pulso también tiene efectos negativos para otras tecnologías xenos.
La sobrecarga consume un 25 % de los escudos de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g}.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the flagship. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
This overload expends 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s shields.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Sobrecarga los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} del enemigo, redistribuyéndolos y dejando el lado más débil orientado hacia la nave insignia. Si el enemigo tiene un campo holográfico, pierde varias cargas. El pulso también tiene efectos negativos para otras tecnologías xenos.
La sobrecarga consume un 25 % de los escudos de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g}.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>

Sobrecarga los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} para interferir en las defensas del enemigo. Si el enemigo tiene escudos, se trasladan al lado opuesto de la ubicación del impacto. Si el enemigo tiene un campo holográfico, pierde varias cargas. El pulso también puede tener un efecto negativo sobre tecnologías xenos.
La sobrecarga consume un 25 % de los escudos de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g}.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>

languages.text:
敵の{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}をオーバーロードして再分配し、その最も弱い面を旗艦へと向けさせる。敵がホロフィールドを持っている場合、チャージを数回失う。このパルスは異種族テクノロジーにも悪影響を与えることがある。
このオーバーロードは、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}のシールドの25%を消費する。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：<u>（1～3）</u> ラウンド（ランダム）。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the flagship. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
This overload expends 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s shields.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
敵の{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}をオーバーロードして再分配し、その最も弱い面を旗艦へと向けさせる。敵がホロフィールドを持っている場合、チャージを数回失う。このパルスは異種族テクノロジーにも悪影響を与えることがある。
このオーバーロードは、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}のシールドの25%を消費する。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：<u>（1～3）</u> ラウンド（ランダム）。</indent>

languages.text:
Düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}kalkanlarını{/g} fazla yükleyerek en zayıf kısmı sancak gemisinin olduğu tarafa bakacak şekilde yeniden dağıtır. Düşmanın holo-alanı varsa birkaç şarjını kaybeder. Dalgalanma ayrıca diğer zeno teknolojilerini de olumsuz etkiler.
Bu fazla yükleme, {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}sancak gemisinin{/g} kalkanlarının %25'ini harcar.
<indent=5%>Dolum Süresi: Rastgele <u>(1 ila 3)</u> raunt.</indent>

This overload expends 25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s shields.
